ISSUE.TITLE: bug: make deps prompt error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Issue description ### Environment * apisix version (cmd: `apisix version`): master * OS (cmd: `uname -a`): ubuntu * OpenResty / Nginx version (cmd: `nginx -V` or `openresty -V`): 1.19 * etcd version, if have (cmd: run `curl http://127.0.0.1:9090/v1/server_info` to get the info from server-info API): * apisix-dashboard version, if have: after excute ``` curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/apache/apisix/master/utils/linux-install-luarocks.sh -sL | sudo bash - ``` `make deps` prompt error: ``` mkdir -p ~/.luarocks luarocks config --local variables.OPENSSL_LIBDIR /usr/local/openresty/openssl/lib Error: Cannot create file at /home/xxxx/.luarocks/config-5.1.lua Makefile:58: recipe for target 'deps' failed make: *** [deps] Error 1 ```
